name: squadron
description: Distributed discovery of docker service tasks
author: Geoff Cox

scripts.assert-beautified: beautify-proj -i test -c beautify.json && beautify-proj -i scripts -c beautify.json
scripts.beautify: beautify-proj -i test -o . -c beautify.json && beautify-proj -i scripts -o . -c beautify.json
scripts.node-full-test: npm run jshint && npm run node-test-with-coverage --coverage && istanbul check-coverage --lines 100 --function 100 --statements 100 --branches 100
scripts.test: npm run assert-beautified && npm run node-full-test
